OOC: Ok then, i think he should be a Maximal to keep up a 'world turned 
upside down' theme.  having Galvatron as a good guy and Optimus Prime as a 
bad guy is an awesome story idea, you see what im saying?

:::Sideswipe/Ratchet/Torca:::

::The missle hits Sideswipe, denting his armor.  He got hit by 2 stinger 
missles.  He retaliated and fired 13 shots and 1 missle at where he hoped 
Double Punch was, and 12 shots and 1 missle at Injector::
~~~~~
::Ratchet got hit by 1 of the stinger missles and fired 15 shots from each 
gun and 2 tusk missles at Injector::
~~~~~
::Torca got hit by both of the stinger missles, starting to bleed even more.  
he fired 25 nails at Bumblebee::


--part1_b9.9d35832.27726d8f_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
